description:
April 1, 2019 / Susan, Colin and Rabia wrap up their discussion on episode 4 of the HBO docuseries #TheCaseAgainstAdnanSyed which reveals new astonishing information.

Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes and Spencer Burdette.

This episode was sponsored by Stamps, Boll and Branch, and SimpliSafe.
